document_data.mainbody:
Oshiga was a trumpet archon in service to Erathaol .
Oshiga had been in service to Erathaol on Mount Celestia for a long time.
Just after the Spellplague of 1385 DR, Oshiga and other five councilors judged the revelations of the deva Eirwyn, who with her allies had come to advise them of a fiendish threat to Celestia.
